items.content_html: A backend expense tracker built with Node.js, Express, and Mongoose is a server-side application designed to efficiently manage and track financial data. It leverages the power of JavaScript, a lightweight server framework, and MongoDB's object modeling capabilities

It leverages the power of JavaScript, a lightweight server framework, and MongoDB's object modeling capabilities

items.content_html: The Currency Converter App is a lightweight and user-friendly tool for converting currencies in real-time. Built with React and styled using styled-components, it features a modern UI with background images and currency icons. The app is Dockerized for easy deployment and scalability
items.title: omkar-shelke25/currency-converter: The Currency Converter App is a lightweight and user-friendly tool for converting currencies in real-time. Built with React and styled using styled-components, it features a modern UI with background images and currency icons. The app is Dockerized for easy deployment and scalability

items.content_html: onlyjs is a lightweight JavaScript library for fast and easy UI development. It allows you to quickly create, style, and render HTML elements with minimal code, making DOM manipulation effortless and efficient.
